con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-redeemVoucher-EDR-Files-Validation
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests correct error codes derived from specification in for DRC: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/MCE/ST_OVD_Portal_DP_DRC_U-036_MCE_IFS.pdf and creation of EDR files test based on documentation: http://mucsgsvn03.sg.de.pri.o2.com/svn/drcrepo/trunk/SRs/FASAD/ST_OVD_DP_DRC_FASAD.docx
EDR validation data for test-cases:
For validation of EDR-Files in data base values from operation system are used like in examples below. PACK_COMMIT_SUCCESSFUL(1, "951100") --------------------------------------- 20160222163114,1200051661,,VoucherRecharge,,4917675543496,951100,o2,,,919121648825,608912-0005-1661,01|P0SurfWoc,EUR,0,1,0,,DRC,1200051661,,,,,,
MONETARY_COMMIT_FAILED(3, "951122"); --------------------------------------- 20160106220000,4100016785,,VoucherRecharge,,4917628086392,951122,o2,,,453791292777,613941-0001-6785,01 ,EUR,2000,2,0,,DRC,4100016785,,,,,,
PACK_COMMIT_FAILED(2, "951122"); --------------------------------------- 20120608131425,2000006952,,VoucherRecharge,,4917689503506,951122,o2,,,448515024890,560620-0000-6952,01|P25EinetpaL,EUR,,1,0,,DRC,2000006952,,,,,,

con:config.con:query: Select VOUCHERS.MSISDN, VOUCHERS.VOUCHER_CODE, VOUCHERS.STATUS, VOUCHERS.CREATED_DATE, EDR_RECORDS.VOUCHER_ID, EDR_RECORDS.EDR_TYPE, EDR_RECORDS.EDR, EDR_RECORDS.STATUS From EDR_RECORDS Inner Join VOUCHERS On VOUCHERS.ID = EDR_RECORDS.VOUCHER_ID Order By VOUCHERS.CREATED_DATE Desc

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
OCS10-BalanceManagement.rechargeAccount: Return response for request with msisdn ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
OCS10-BalanceManagement.deductBalance: Return response for request with msisdn ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
all or nothing flag is: true
